participant_1.background:
I try to walk with my cats every day, and I also do some yoga.
my dream is to own my own restaurant.
i like to write poetry in my spare time.
my mom is my best friend.
I enjoy learning about new technologies and how to use them to enhance my teaching.

participant_2.background:
I am not a homeowner, but I do love the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
i am very short.
I spend time with my dogs because they always make me laugh.
i have three dogs and two cats.
I do not have kids because I enjoy my quiet life with my cat.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hello! It is going great! I just got back from a walk with my three dogs and two cats.
That sounds like a lot of animals! What are their names?
My dogs are named Bailey, Toby, and Jack. My cats are named Mittens and Smokey.
Those are all great names! Do you have any other pets?
No, those are my only pets. I do not have any kids because I like my quiet life.
That is totally understandable. I love my dog, but I do not think I am ready for kids yet.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Charlie. He is the best dog ever!
Golden retrievers are the best! I love their big, friendly personalities.
They are so friendly and loving. I am so glad I have Charlie in my life.
I am sure he is glad to have you in his life too!
I know he is! He loves to play fetch and go for walks.
Sounds like he is a very active dog!
He is! He gets me out of the house and moving every day.
That is great! It is important to stay active.
I agree! I am glad I have Charlie to help me stay active.
Me too! He sounds like a great dog.
He is the best dog ever
